          <title>
            <string language="en">Internet Quiz</string>

            <string language="ga">An tIdirlíon – Tráth na gCeist</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">So what do you know about the Internet?</string>
            <string language="es">¿Qué sabes acerca de Internet?</string>
            <string language="ga">Céard atá ar eolas agat faoin Idirlíon?</string>
